      • register

        public int register(java.io.BufferedReader r)
             throws java.io.IOException
        This function implements the user registration in the client.
        Parameters:
        r - the System.in.
        Returns:
        0 if registration is successfully completed, -2 otherwise
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - On input error.
        See Also:
        IOException

      • login

        public User login(java.io.BufferedReader r,
         java.lang.Thread kaThread)
        This function implements the login and starts the KeepAliveThread in the client.
        Parameters:
        r - the System.in.
        kaThread - is the KeepAliveThread in client
        Returns:
        the logged user or a user with non-significant values in case of failure

      • follow

        public int follow(java.io.BufferedReader r)
           throws java.io.IOException
        This function adds the currently logged user in some user's followers list
        Parameters:
        r - System.in
        Returns:
        0 if the follow request is successfully processed, -2 if an IOError occurs.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

        public int logout()
        This function logs out the client.
